plugin.name: in
plugin.onover: set(blendmode,add);set(alpha,0.8); set(zorder,1); tween(width,54, easeoutexpo); tween(height,83, easeoutexpo);
plugin.onout: set(blendmode,screen);set(alpha,1); set(zorder,0); tween(width,44, easeoutexpo); tween(height,73, easeoutexpo);

plugin.name: out
plugin.onover: set(blendmode,add);set(alpha,0.8); set(zorder,1); tween(width,54, easeoutexpo); tween(height,83, easeoutexpo);
plugin.onout: set(blendmode,screen);set(alpha,1); set(zorder,0); tween(width,44, easeoutexpo); tween(height,73, easeoutexpo);

plugin.name: sound_on
plugin.onout: set(blendmode,screen); showtext([br],smalltext)
plugin.onover: set(blendmode,add);set(alpha,0.8); set(zorder,1); tween(width,54, easeoutexpo); tween(height,83, easeoutexpo);
plugin.onout: set(blendmode,screen);set(alpha,1); set(zorder,0); tween(width,44, easeoutexpo); tween(height,73, easeoutexpo);
